Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from region of GB virus C glycoprotein E2)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.21543477]HIV-1(92UG024):inhibition of HIV replication in TZM-bl cells(IC50=15.07 μM);HIV-1(RU570):inhibition of HIV replication in TZM-bl cells(IC50=18.28 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The possible mechanism of action is that the peptide could inhibit  membrane fusion and inhibit HIV-1 replication in cells.

Literature.Title: Peptides derived from a distinct region of GB virus C glycoprotein E2 mediate strain-specific HIV-1 entry inhibition.
Literature.Author: Koedel Y, Eissmann K, Wend H, Fleckenstein B, Reil H.
